title: Palace Cafe
creator_credit: AFTRS, Murray Fahey and Andrew Lancaster
brief_description: The Palace Cafe, a place where solitary drinkers sip their cappuccinos, read their newspapers and nothing much else happens. The cafe becomes alive one night when a lonely man spots an attractive woman across the room and staff and patrons burst into dance, choreographing their moves to the tune of the lonely man’s imagination.
